ProductInfo.Features:
GW9708SH: Professional 8 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime DVR with HDMI & VGA. 960×480 & 30FPS recording. iPhone, Android Viewing. New color graphical menu. Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control
GW30WD: Professional 1/3" Exview HAD CCD II with Effio-E DSP Devices Camera. 700 TV lines, 2.8~12mm varifocal lens, 42pcs IR LED, 115 ft IR Distance. WDR(Wide Dynamic Range). OSD Menu. Vandal proof & water proof
GW108M: Professional 1/3" Effio CCD Camera. 700 TV lines, 2.8~12mm varifocal lens, 36pcs IR LED, 98 ft IR Distance. WDR(Wide Dynamic Range). OSD Menu. Metal vandal proof
Package Includes:     GW9708SH DVR with 2TB HDD;     GWLED19IN  - Free 19" Wide Screen LED monitor;     3 x GW30WD: 1/3" Effio CCD Bullet Camera;     3 x GW108M: 1/3" Effio CCD Dome Camera;
1 x GW125CAW: 125 feet pre-made cable BNC; 1 x GW100CAW: 100 feet pre-made cable BNC; 3 x GW60CAW: 60 feet pre-made cable BNC; 1 x GW25CAW: 25 feet pre-made cable BNC; 1 x 12V5A Power Supply For Security Cameras; 1 x 1 to 8 Power Splitter Adapter Cable.
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Inc 6CHE4 8 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime DVR with 6 x Effio CCD 700 TV lines varifocal lens Security Camera System Free LED (White/Black)
